title: Textile, "Sofia Damask", 1974
dimensions:
Warp x Weft: 137 x 132 cm (53 15/16 x 51 15/16 in.)
Height of repeat: 44.5 cm (17.5")
creditline: Gift of F. Schumacher and Co.
description: Vertically symmeterical pattern derived from an Afghanistan warp ikat.  narrow warm stripes simulate the jagged edge of an ikat pattern.
